verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) — [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: accused] [ARG1: the Justice Department] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] [ARG2: of trying to frame him by planting a spy in his 2016 campaign — an allegation his own lawye]
